channel.title: SCAR 2.03 problem
channel.description:
I downloaded SCAR 2.03 about an hour ago and installed, but when I try to run it I get an error saying "Windows Cannot open the specified device, path, or file. You may not have the appropriate permissions to access the item."
Sooo...how can I get SCAR to work? (Btw, Scar divi works. But some of the old scripts I used for 2.03 don't work for Divi.)

item.title: SCAR 2.03 problem
item.dc:creator: @3.65_kilos 3.65 kilos
